name: FRigVMFunction_StringTruncate
doc: Returns the left or right most characters from the string chopping the given number of characters from the start or the end

Name: FString
Count: Number of characters to remove from left or right
FromEnd: if set to true the characters will be removed from the end
Remainder: the part of the string without the chopped characters
Chopped: the part of the name that has been chopped off
